Robert Thomas

 
City Council
Title: Councilman Pos. 1
Phone: (832) 573-2611
Email


Robert Thomas as been serving on the City Council since 1997. Robert is a member of the West Columbia Economic Development Corporation, the Capital Improvement Committee and the West Columbia Lions Club.

He currently serves as a probation officer with Brazoria County Adult Probation.
